com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller

Class SBExpensesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.justyna.stachera.householdexpenses.controller.SBExpensesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SBWebsitesAndMessages

    @Controller
public class SBExpensesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements SBWebsitesAndMessages
    Version:
    2.0

    User: jstachera

    Date: 02.01.2018

    Controller class with methods that support '/expenses/**' links directly.

    Author:
    Justyna Stachera.

      • SBExpensesController

        @Autowired
public SBExpensesController(SBExpenseDao expenseDao,
                                        SBExpenseCustomDao expenseCustomDao,
                                        SBFormOfPaymentDao formOfPaymentDao,
                                        SBKindOfOperationDao kindOfOperationDao,
                                        SBExpenseCategoryDao expenseCategoryDao,
                                        SBExpenseJoinedService expenseJoinedService,
                                        SBUserDao userDao,
                                        SBExpenseValidator expenseValidator,
                                        SBExpenseJoinedValidator expenseJoinedValidator)
        An argument constructor autowired interfaces extending JpaRepository and Validator objects.
        Parameters:
        expenseDao - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense' table from database.
        expenseCustomDao - It provides extra methods related with 'sbexpense' table from database.
        formOfPaymentDao - It provides methods related with 'sbform_of_payment' table from database.
        kindOfOperationDao - It provides methods related with 'sbkind_of_operation' table from database.
        expenseCategoryDao - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense_category' table from database.
        expenseJoinedService - It provides methods related with 'sbexpense_category', 'sbform_of_payment', 'sbkind_of_operation' and 'sbuser' tables from database.
        userDao - It provides methods related with 'sbuser' table from database.
        expenseValidator - It validates SBExpense object fields.
        expenseJoinedValidator - It validates SBExpenseJoined object fields.

                                                                                                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="expenseModifyInfo")
                                                                                                                                                    SBField modifyInfo,
                                                                                                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="expenseRemoveInfo")
                                                                                                                                                    SBField removeInfo,
                                                                                                                                                    @ModelAttribute(value="isExpenseUserIdInvalid")

                                                                                                                                                    SBBoolean isExpensePeriodicInvalid,
                                                                                                                                                    org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        A method is used to show a expense list, sort it and find record by expense ID.
        Parameters:
        expenseField - An chosen field from a sort bar.
        expenseId - An ID value chosen field.
        chosenEnum - It informs in which column the table has to be sorted.
        addInfo - A message about adding a new record to database.
        modifyInfo - A message about modification a record in database.
        removeInfo - A message about deleting record from database.
        isExpenseUserIdInvalid - It checks if user ID is invalid.
        isExpensePeriodicInvalid - It checks if periodic is invalid.
        modelAndView - It contains all models and a logical view name.
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView interface implementation.
